04DE1729FAF94CEBA9A383DA4A044F84.description:
Students learn medical interventions that extend and improve quality of life including gene
therapy, use, and development of prosthetics, rehabilitation techniques, and supportive
care. Students will use 3D imaging, data acquisition software, and current scientific research
to design and develop medical intervention products. Students will demonstrate current and
emerging strategies and technologies used for collecting, analyzing, recording, and sharing
information. In addition, students will develop leadership and team‐building skills that
promote collaboration.
